reports.title: Countries in Graph

settings.description: Countries that have data submitted to the EU portal.

reports.title: Map on Tracks
Country Selected
reports.query: RETURN $neodash_countrycode

reports.title: Stations in country
reports.query:
MATCH(op:OperationalPoint)
WHERE op.id STARTS WITH $neodash_countrycode 
AND labels(op)[1] IN ['Station','SmallStation'] 
RETURN count(op);

reports.title: Switches in country
reports.query:
MATCH(op:OperationalPoint)
WHERE op.id STARTS WITH $neodash_countrycode 
AND labels(op)[1] IN ['Switch','Junction'] 
RETURN count(op);

reports.title: Passenger Stops in country
reports.query:
MATCH(op:OperationalPoint)
WHERE op.id STARTS WITH $neodash_countrycode 
AND labels(op)[1] IN ['PassengerStop','PassengerTerminal'] 
RETURN count(op);

MATCH(op:OperationalPoint)-[:NAMED]->(opn:OperationalPointName)
WHERE op.id STARTS WITH $neodash_countrycode 
AND labels(op)[1] IN ['Station','SmallStation'] 
RETURN opn.name AS Station

reports.title: Start
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`OperationalPointName`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Destination
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`OperationalPointName`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: POIs on your Track
reports.query:
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_1})<-[:NAMED]-(op1:OperationalPoint)
WITH op1.id AS startid
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_2})<-[:NAMED]-(op2:OperationalPoint)
WITH op2.id AS destid, startid
MATCH (source:OperationalPoint WHERE source.id = startid), (target:OperationalPoint WHERE target.id = destid)
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(source, target, 'SECTION', 'sectionlength') yield path as path
WITH nodes(path) AS nodeset
UNWIND nodeset AS nod
MATCH(nod)-[:IS_NEAR]->(p:POI)
RETURN count(p);

reports.title: Shortest Path Track to travel
reports.query:
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_1})<-[:NAMED]-(op1:OperationalPoint)
WITH op1.id AS startid
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_2})<-[:NAMED]-(op2:OperationalPoint)
WITH op2.id AS destid, startid
MATCH (source:OperationalPoint WHERE source.id = startid), (target:OperationalPoint WHERE target.id = destid)
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(source, target, 'SECTION', 'sectionlength') yield path as path
RETURN path;

reports.title: Trip Length in km
reports.query:
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_1})<-[:NAMED]-(op1:OperationalPoint)
WITH op1.id AS startid
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_2})<-[:NAMED]-(op2:OperationalPoint)
WITH op2.id AS destid, startid

MATCH (source:OperationalPoint WHERE source.id = startid), (target:OperationalPoint WHERE target.id = destid)
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(source, target, 'SECTION', 'sectionlength') yield path as path, weight as weight
RETURN weight;

reports.title: Travel Map
reports.query:
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_1})<-[:NAMED]-(op1:OperationalPoint)
WITH op1.id AS startid
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_2})<-[:NAMED]-(op2:OperationalPoint)
WITH op2.id AS destid, startid
MATCH (source:OperationalPoint WHERE source.id = startid), (target:OperationalPoint WHERE target.id = destid)
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(source, target, 'SECTION', 'sectionlength') yield path as path
RETURN path;

reports.title: POIs on the ride
reports.query:
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_1})<-[:NAMED]-(op1:OperationalPoint)
WITH op1.id AS startid
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_2})<-[:NAMED]-(op2:OperationalPoint)
WITH op2.id AS destid, startid
MATCH (source:OperationalPoint WHERE source.id = startid), (target:OperationalPoint WHERE target.id = destid)
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(source, target, 'SECTION', 'sectionlength') yield path as path
WITH nodes(path) AS nodeset
UNWIND nodeset AS nod
MATCH(nod)-[:IS_NEAR]->(p:POI)
RETURN p.city AS City, p.description AS Description, p.linkFoto AS Foto;

reports.title: POI Foto
reports.query: ![image]($neodash_linkFoto)

reports.title: Start
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`OperationalPointName`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Destination
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`OperationalPointName`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Select Speed OR Time
reports.query: RETURN 'sectionlength' AS Shortest, 'traveltime' AS Fastest;

reports.title: Calculation done for
reports.query:
# Calculation done on:
# $neodash_speedtime

reports.title: Travel by $neodash_speedtime
reports.query:
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_3})<-[:NAMED]-(op1:OperationalPoint)
WITH op1.id AS startid
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_4})<-[:NAMED]-(op2:OperationalPoint)
WITH op2.id AS destid, startid
MATCH (source:OperationalPoint WHERE source.id = startid), (target:OperationalPoint WHERE target.id = destid)
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(source, target, 'SECTION', $neodash_speedtime) yield path as path
RETURN path;

reports.title: Travel Distance (km)
reports.query:
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_3})<-[:NAMED]-(op1:OperationalPoint)
WITH op1.id AS startid
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_4})<-[:NAMED]-(op2:OperationalPoint)
WITH op2.id AS destid, startid
MATCH (source:OperationalPoint WHERE source.id = startid), (target:OperationalPoint WHERE target.id = destid)
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(source, target, 'SECTION', $neodash_speedtime) yield path as path, weight as weight
WITH relationships(path) AS rels
UNWIND rels AS rel
RETURN sum(rel.sectionlength);

reports.title: Travel Time (h)
reports.query:
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_3})<-[:NAMED]-(op1:OperationalPoint)
WITH op1.id AS startid
MATCH (:OperationalPointName {name: $neodash_operationalpointname_name_4})<-[:NAMED]-(op2:OperationalPoint)
WITH op2.id AS destid, startid
MATCH (source:OperationalPoint WHERE source.id = startid), (target:OperationalPoint WHERE target.id = destid)
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(source, target, 'SECTION', $neodash_speedtime) yield path as path, weight as weight
WITH relationships(path) AS rels
UNWIND rels AS rel
RETURN sum(rel.traveltime)/3600;

reports.title: List of POIs
reports.query:
MATCH (po:POI)
RETURN 
	po.city AS City, 
    po.description AS Description, 
    po.linkFoto AS Photo, 
    po.linkWebSite AS Website;

reports.title: POI Photo
reports.query: ![image]($neodash_foto)

reports.query:
